EmailTemplate.subject: A New Season Is Here.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/government/default.aspx?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Refresh Your Office For Warmer Weather <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/government/default.aspx?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Your most used Cleaning & Breakroom products are ready to ship Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1yzvrga?cmp=HFGSKAPR19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We’ve got you covered this season! Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/browse/We-ve-got-you-covered/_/N-e8m?cmp=HFGSMAPR19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Get all your facilities maintenance products conveniently in one place Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/feb-facilities19-gov.aspx?cmp=HFGFCAPR19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
